title: Allocate Budget to Ad Groups
description: A manager needs to allocate a campaign's total budget across its different ad groups based on their strategic priority.

tasks.description: Identify the total campaign budget and the different ad groups within it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the necessary budget and campaign structure information.

tasks.description: Allocate a higher percentage of the budget to high-priority ad groups (e.g., those targeting high-intent keywords).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines a logical budget split (e.g., 60% to Ad Group A, 40% to Ad Group B).

tasks.description: Set the specific daily or lifetime budgets for each ad group in the platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the budget settings for each ad group.
